pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, November 12, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the King of Jordan, Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

12:45 p.m.  The Prime Minister and Member of Parliament for Windsor–Tecumseh Irek Kusmierczyk will participate in a virtual roundtable on labour with local union members.

2:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister, Member of Parliament for London West Kate Young, and Member of Parliament for London North Centre Peter Fragiskatos will participate in a virtual roundtable on COVID-19 with healthcare workers from London Health Sciences Centre and St. Joseph’s Health Care London.

7:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual Diwali celebration hosted by Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand, Member of Parliament for Scarborough–Rouge Park Gary Anandasangaree, and Member of Parliament for Kitchener Centre Raj Saini.

Closed to media.
